entry.title: Monday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to a few flurries and ending this evening then cloudy. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast late this evening and overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 06 February 2023
